frozen_definition.name: TripEase
frozen_definition.signal_source: Travel comments show 'wait until last minute to pack, total NIGHTMARE', 'left important things at home'
frozen_definition.description: Last-minute travel assistant that creates instant packing lists and sends location-based reminders for forgotten essentials
frozen_definition.target_user: Spontaneous travelers and business travelers who often pack at the last minute and forget important items
frozen_definition.pain_point_evidence: Users describe last-minute packing as 'total NIGHTMARE especially when catching flights'
frozen_definition.differentiation: Optimized for speed vs. comprehensive planning, focus on essentials vs. complete travel management
frozen_definition.subscription_fit: Premium includes multiple trip profiles, weather alerts, and travel document reminders

pricing.trial_strategy: Free for basic essentials list, premium for personalization and alerts
